name: places/ChIJW-uvEh70wokRGK63LAXbWlw
formattedAddress: 656 W 183rd St, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 656 W 183rd St, New York, NY 10033-3806, USA

originalText.text: I was appalled at the grimy state of this medical office.I thought perhaps it was only the waiting room, but it was so dirty  and dusty in the examining rooms, with unsterilized bandages in stained, dirty unlined drawers. There were several full garbage bags just sitting in the hallway, dust, filthy covered old computer equipment in the treatment rooms. We saw Dr. Chang, who was pleasant, but his scrubs were stained (old stains) so again, we didn't feel that comfortable.I highly advise all to STAY AWAY from this practice. You might end up with an infection. I cannot believe that Dr. Rivera is allowed to practice medicine in a facility such as this. For shame. In addition, our appointment was scheduled for 10:00 and the doctor came in the office at 10:30. Really? My biggest regret was not walking out of there before seeing the doctor. We will not return and we told the office staff this.

originalText.text: Great office staff,  Great doctor! Very helpful.
